member.name: T:ApplicationAccess.IAccessManager`4
member.summary: Defines methods to manage the access of users and groups of users to components and entities within an application.
member.typeparam: The type of users in the application.
The type of groups in the application.
The type of components in the application to manage access to.
The type of levels of access which can be assigned to an application component.

member.name: T:ApplicationAccess.IAccessManagerQueryProcessor`4
member.summary: Defines methods which query state/structure of an AccessManager implementation.
member.typeparam: The type of users in the application managed by the AccessManager.
The type of groups in the application managed by the AccessManager.
The type of components in the application managed by the AccessManager.
The type of levels of access which can be assigned to an application component.

member.name: P:ApplicationAccess.IAccessManagerQueryProcessor`4.Users
member.summary: Returns a collection of all users in the access manager.

member.name: P:ApplicationAccess.IAccessManagerQueryProcessor`4.Groups
member.summary: Returns a collection of all groups in the access manager.

member.name: P:ApplicationAccess.IAccessManagerQueryProcessor`4.EntityTypes
member.summary: Returns a collection of all entity types in the access manager.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.IAccessManagerQueryProcessor`4.ContainsUser(`0)
member.summary: Returns true if the specified user exists.
member.returns: True if the user exists. False otherwise.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.IAccessManagerQueryProcessor`4.ContainsGroup(`1)
member.summary: Returns true if the specified group exists.
member.returns: True if the group exists. False otherwise.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.IAccessManagerQueryProcessor`4.GetUserToGroupMappings(`0)
member.summary: Gets the groups that the specified user is directly mapped to (i.e. is a member of).
member.param: The user to retrieve the groups for.
member.returns: A collection of groups the specified user is a member of.
member.remarks: This method does not traverse the graph which holds group to group mappings, hence only groups mapped directly to the specified user are returned.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.IAccessManagerQueryProcessor`4.GetGroupToGroupMappings(`1)
member.summary: Gets the groups that the specified group is directly mapped to.
member.param: The group to retrieve the mapped groups for.
member.returns: A collection of groups the specified group is mapped to.
member.remarks: This method does not traverse the graph which holds group to group mappings, hence only groups mapped directly to the specified group are returned.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.IAccessManagerQueryProcessor`4.GetUserToApplicationComponentAndAccessLevelMappings(`0)
member.summary: Gets the application component and access level pairs that the specified user is mapped to.
member.param: The user to retrieve the mappings for.
member.returns: A collection of Tuples containing the application component and access level pairs that the specified user is mapped to.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.IAccessManagerQueryProcessor`4.GetGroupToApplicationComponentAndAccessLevelMappings(`1)
member.summary: Gets the application component and access level pairs that the specified group is mapped to.
member.param: The group to retrieve the mappings for.
member.returns: A collection of Tuples containing the application component and access level pairs that the specified group is mapped to.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.IAccessManagerQueryProcessor`4.ContainsEntityType(System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if the specified entity type exists.
member.param: The entity type to check for.
member.returns: True if the entity type exists. False otherwise.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.IAccessManagerQueryProcessor`4.GetEntities(System.String)
member.summary: Returns all entities of the specified type.
member.returns: A collection of all entities of the specified type.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.IAccessManagerQueryProcessor`4.ContainsEntity(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if the specified entity exists.
member.returns: True if the entity exists. False otherwise.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.IAccessManagerQueryProcessor`4.GetUserToEntityMappings(`0)
member.summary: Gets the entities that the specified user is mapped to.
member.param: The user to retrieve the mappings for.
member.returns: A collection of Tuples containing the entity type and entity that the specified user is mapped to.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.IAccessManagerQueryProcessor`4.GetUserToEntityMappings(`0,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the entities of a given type that the specified user is mapped to.
member.param: The user to retrieve the mappings for.
The entity type to retrieve the mappings for.
member.returns: A collection of entities that the specified user is mapped to.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.IAccessManagerQueryProcessor`4.GetGroupToEntityMappings(`1)
member.summary: Gets the entities that the specified group is mapped to.
member.param: The group to retrieve the mappings for.
member.returns: A collection of Tuples containing the entity type and entity that the specified group is mapped to.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.IAccessManagerQueryProcessor`4.GetGroupToEntityMappings(`1,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the entities of a given type that the specified group is mapped to.
member.param: The group to retrieve the mappings for.
The entity type to retrieve the mappings for.
member.returns: A collection of entities that the specified group is mapped to.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.IAccessManagerQueryProcessor`4.HasAccessToApplicationComponent(`0,`2,`3)
member.summary: Checks whether the specified user (or a group that the user is a member of) has access to an application component at the specified level of access.
member.param: The level of access to the component.
member.returns: True if the user has access the component. False otherwise.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.IAccessManagerQueryProcessor`4.HasAccessToEntity(`0,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether the specified user (or a group that the user is a member of) has access to the specified entity.
member.returns: True if the user has access the entity. False otherwise.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.IAccessManagerQueryProcessor`4.GetApplicationComponentsAccessibleByUser(`0)
member.summary: Gets all application components and levels of access that the specified user (or a group that the user is a member of) has access to.
member.param: The user to retrieve the application components and levels of access for.
member.returns: The application components and levels of access to those application components that the user has.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.IAccessManagerQueryProcessor`4.GetApplicationComponentsAccessibleByGroup(`1)
member.summary: Gets all application components and levels of access that the specified group (or group that the specified group is mapped to) has access to.
member.param: The group to retrieve the application components and levels of access for.
member.returns: The application components and levels of access to those application components that the group has.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.IAccessManagerQueryProcessor`4.GetEntitiesAccessibleByUser(`0,System.String)
member.summary: Gets all entities of a given type that the specified user (or a group that the user is a member of) has access to.
member.param: The user to retrieve the entities for.
The type of entities to retrieve.
member.returns: The entities the user has access to.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.IAccessManagerQueryProcessor`4.GetEntitiesAccessibleByGroup(`1,System.String)
member.summary: Gets all entities of a given type that the specified group (or group that the specified group is mapped to) has access to.
member.param: The group to retrieve the entities for.
The type of entities to retrieve.
member.returns: The entities the group has access to.
